006
007package renderer.models_T;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011
012/**
013   Create a flat solid checkerboard panel in the xz-plane.
014*/
015public class PanelXZ extends Model
016{
017   /**
018      Create a flat checkerboard panel in the xz-plane that runs
019      from -1 to 1 in the x-direction and -1 to 1 in the z-direction.
020   */
021   public PanelXZ( )
022   {
023      this(-1, 1, -1, 1);
024   }
025
026
027   /**
028      Create a flat checkerboard panel in the xz-plane with the given dimensions.
029
030      @param xMin  location of left edge
031      @param xMax  location of right edge
032      @param zMin  location of back edge
033      @param zMax  location of front edge
034   */
035   public PanelXZ(final int xMin, final int xMax,
036                  final int zMin, final int zMax)
037   {
038      this(xMin, xMax, zMin, zMax, 0.0);
039   }
040
041
042   /**
043      Create a flat checkerboard panel parallel to the xz-plane with the given dimensions.
044
045      @param xMin  location of left edge
046      @param xMax  location of right edge
047      @param zMin  location of back edge
048      @param zMax  location of front edge
049      @param y     y-plane that holds the panel
050   */
051   public PanelXZ(final int xMin, final int xMax,
052                  final int zMin, final int zMax,
053                  final double y)
054   {
055      super("PanelXZ");
056
057      // Create the checkerboard panel's geometry.
058
059      // An array of indexes to be used to create triangles.
060      final int[][] index = new int[(xMax-xMin)+1][(zMax-zMin)+1];
061
062      // Create the checkerboard of vertices.
063      int i = 0;
064      for (int x = xMin; x <= xMax; ++x)
065      {
066         for (int z = zMin; z <= zMax; ++z)
067         {
068            addVertex(new Vertex(x, y, z));
069            index[x-xMin][z-zMin] = i;
070            ++i;
071         }
072      }
073
074      // Create the checkerboard of triangles.
075      for (int x = 0; x < xMax-xMin; ++x)
076      {
077         for (int z = 0; z < zMax-zMin; ++z)
078         {
079            addPrimitive(new Triangle(index[x  ][z  ],
080                                     index[x  ][z+1],
081                                     index[x+1][z+1]));
082            addPrimitive(new Triangle(index[x+1][z+1],
083                                      index[x+1][z  ],
084                                      index[x  ][z  ]));
085         }
086      }
087   }
088}//PanelXZ
